document.full_text: struggling irish telecoms group eircom said on friday it must accelerate talks on restructuring its debt with shareholders and lenders ahead of a likely breach in its financial covenants within the next three months.
document.title: eircom to speed up talks as covenant breach looms
lines_and_colors: struggling irish telecoms group eircom said on friday it must accelerate talks on restructuring its debt with shareholders and lenders ahead of a likely breach in its financial covenants within the next three months.
